title_teim: The twenty-sixth annual induction ceremony. 2011. Tape 100.
title_ssm: The twenty-sixth annual induction ceremony. 2011. Tape 100.
title_si: The twenty-sixth annual induction ceremony. 2011. Tape 100.
label_teim: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame VTR: 3.14.11 Tape #100 (Line)
label_ssm: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame VTR: 3.14.11 Tape #100 (Line)
contents_teim: Audience shots -- Jann Wenner gives opening remarks -- Montage of past inductions -- John Legend inducts Dr. John -- Dr. John accepts his award -- Lloyd Price inducts Art Rupe and accepts the award on his behalf -- John Densmore inducts Jac Holzman -- Holzman accepts his award -- Bette Middler inducts Darlene Love -- Love accepts her award -- Rob Zombie inducts Alice Cooper -- 18 ; Under my wheels ; School's out (Alice Cooper) -- Alice Cooper accepts their award. Alice Cooper speaks ; Dennis Dunaway speaks ; Michael Owen Bruce speaks ; Neal Smith speaks.

Alice Cooper speaks ; Dennis Dunaway speaks ; Michael Owen Bruce speaks ; Neal Smith speaks.

abstract_ssm: At 2011 Induction Ceremony -- Jann Wenner gives opening remarks -- Montage of past inductions -- John Legend inducts Dr. John -- Video montage of Dr. John -- Dr. John accepts his award -- Lloyd Price inducts Art Rupe and accepts the award on his behalf -- John Densmore inducts Jac Holzman -- Jac Holzman accepts his award -- Bette Midler inducts Darlene Love -- Video Montage of Darlene Love -- Darlene Love accepts her award -- Rob Zombie inducts Alice Cooper -- Video montage of Alice Cooper -- I'm Eighteen ; Under My Wheels (Alice Cooper) -- School's Out (Alice Cooper with Rob Zombie, and New York Pops) -- Alice Cooper accepts their award: Alice Cooper speaks ; Dennis Dunaway speaks ; Michael Owen Bruce speaks ; Neal Smith speaks
